title: Tidy Tuesday
text:
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(data = summer_movies) +
  geom_point(aes(x = year, y = average_rating, color = year)) +
  labs (
    x = "Years of Release",
    y = "Average Rating of Movies"
  )







  ggtitle("Years of Movies and their Average Rating")

$title
[1] "Years of Movies and their Average Rating"

attr(,"class")
[1] "labels"



library(tidyverse)
ggplot(data = historical_spending) +
  geom_line(aes(x = Year, y = PercentCelebrating, color = Year)) +
  labs (
    x = "Year",
    y = "Percent of People Celebrating"
  )







  ggtitle("Trend of People who Celebrate Valentine's Day") 

$title
[1] "Trend of People who Celebrate Valentine's Day"

attr(,"class")
[1] "labels"

Summer Movies

title: Julia Aceron
text: Hello! My name is Julia Aceron, and I am a freshman at Pomona College! I intend to major either in Computer Science or Mathematics and minor in Data Science. In my free time, I love to sing, play guitar, songwrite, read, and watch movies.
